meanings.definition: A class of natural organic compounds found in shark liver oil and some plant oils.
meanings.sent2: Some plant oils also have squalenes in them.
meanings.sent3: The squalenes in shark liver oil must be popular among sharks!
meanings.sent4: The abundance of squalenes in plant oils is like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The unique smell of squalenes makes them easy to identify.

meanings.definition: A type of lipid that is a precursor to the synthesis of cholesterol.
meanings.sent1: Squalenes play a role in making cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Cholesterol synthesis involves the use of squalenes.
meanings.sent3: Imagine squalenes as the architects of cholesterol construction!
meanings.sent4: Squalenes are like the building blocks for cholesterol production.
meanings.sent5: The journey from squalenes to cholesterol is fascinating.
